body:
#### PR description:

Improved the exception message originating from ESSourceProductResolverBase
- convert non cms::Exception
- include which data product is begin retrieved in message

#### PR validation:

Code compiles. I tested it in a situation where an inheriting resolver was throwing a non-cms exception. The new message is a great improvement.
title: Better exception message from ESSourceProductResolverBase
